keyword.name: evalc
keyword.description: Evaluate Nelson code with console capture.

keyword.name: evalin
keyword.description: Evaluate Nelson code in string in an specified scope.

keyword.name: inputname
keyword.description: Get variable name of function input.

keyword.name: isunicodesupported
keyword.description: Detect whether the current terminal supports Unicode.

keyword.name: maxNumCompThreads
keyword.description: Set/Get maximum number of computional threads.

keyword.name: namelengthmax
keyword.description: Return the maximum variable name length.

keyword.name: nargin
keyword.description: Returns the number of input arguments.

keyword.name: narginchk
keyword.description: Checks the number of input arguments.

keyword.name: nargout
keyword.description: Returns the number of output arguments.

keyword.name: nargoutchk
keyword.description: Checks the number of output arguments.

keyword.name: nfilename
keyword.description: Returns the name of the currently executing file.

keyword.name: mfilename
keyword.description: Returns the name of the currently executing file.

keyword.name: prefdir
keyword.description: Return the preferences directory used by Nelson.
